issue.title: [Format][Documentation] Update union-of-structs documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14578](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14578). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation for Dense union contains "Critically, the dense union allows for minimal overhead in the ubiquitous union-of-structs with non-overlapping-fields use case (``Union<s1: Struct1, s2: Struct2, s3: Struct3, ...>``)" which is incorrect and should be moved to the doc for sparse union.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14578?focusedCommentId=17438137) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hmm, my guess is "overhead" in that sentence refers to the memory footprint rather than the processing cost.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14578?focusedCommentId=17441927) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11607
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11607>
